about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey in this text-based RPG, where every decision shapes your fate. Dive into a richly woven narrative filled with mystery and intrigue, where each step forward brings you closer to uncovering the truth. As you delve deeper into the world around you, your investigative skills will be put to the test, unraveling secrets and piecing together clues to solve complex puzzles.

Immerse yourself in a world where every decision matters, and every choice leads you closer to the truth. Are you ready to embark on this unforgettable adventure?"

Features

Choice Matters

Your choices matter, influencing the course of events and determining the outcome of your journey. Will you follow the path of righteousness or succumb to darker temptations? The fate of the story lies in your hands.

A Simple Inventory System

Manage your inventory wisely, collecting essential items and tools that will aid you on your quest. From ancient artifacts to modern gadgets, every item holds significance and can be the key to unlocking new paths or overcoming challenges.

Character Skills

But it's not just your items that matter; your character's skills play a crucial role too. Whether you're a master sleuth, a skilled negotiator, or a cunning strategist, your abilities will shape your approach to each situation, offering unique opportunities and consequences.

Thank you so much for your visit! I'm a solo indie game developer, I'm working in this game with a friend and We are doing our best to improve the game based on the community feedback. By purchasing the game you are encoraging us to keep making games even better. Best wishes!

To request features, enhancements or comunicate issues join us on our discord channel
